snippet: Top seed Andy Murray continued his pursuit of Novak Djokovic in the race to end the year as number one in the ATP rankings with a crushing 6-2 6-3 defeat of Spain's David Ferrer to reach the final of the China Open on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Top seed Andy Murray continued his pursuit of Novak Djokovic in the race to end the year as number one in the ATP rankings with a crushing 6-2 6-3 defeat of Spain's David Ferrer to reach the final of the China Open on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Continues Djokovic Chase by Reaching China Open Final
headline.main: Murray Continues Djokovic Chase by Reaching China Open Final
